name: Grav-Bomber - v0.1 (WebGL Browser Only)
description:
First test of the gravity-driving game. Line's are for debugging purposes in testing of the "camera-on-a-boom-whilst-looking-at-the-forward-movement-vector".

Shift is a time-limited boost, unfortunately does not have any feedback at this point, but is capable of generating enough speed to leave an asteroid's gravity.

Controls/Instructions:
